modName: More BYO Voice packs for PC Head Tracking and Voice Type - DELETED
summary: Have you always wanted a BYO voice pack from games like Team Fortress 2, but didn't know how to do it? No worries, I made it for you - all 9 classes + 1 special "Michael Rosen" to spice your game up a little.
descriptionHtml:
Have you always wanted a BYO voice pack from games like Team Fortress 2, but didn't know how to do it? No worries, I made it for you - all 9 classes + 1 special "Michael Rosen" to spice your game up a little. You will need the core mod of course: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?

Installation: 
I'm sure you know where to put the folder, but in case: Skyrim\Data\sound\fx

Greeting Function:
Functions like HELLO, GOODBYE and RANDOM work differently here. Just like in tf2, they are used as Positive, Negative and Taunt. I recommend you to bind keys to them. I was also trying to make them as lore-friendly as possible.

Hello - Negative Response (tap the key when there is something you don't like e.g. boss fight, loot, corpses, room, events...)
Goodbye - Positive Response (tap the key when there is something you like e.g. finished quest, cleared dungeon, loot, events...)
Random - Taunt (tap the key when you are in a fight with an enemy, taunting them like they do you)

If you don't like any particular sound, you can delete it or edit it. If you want to suggest something to change or suggest other games' voice packs to make, please do so.

Be sure to endorse the core mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?

Uploaded with HHaleyy's permission.
author: RickUnkinetic
